attributes.action: DVLA not to ban Raised lettering (3D/4D) on Car Number Plates
attributes.additional_details: Not to ban this on 1st September 2021
attributes.background: Not to ban Raised lettering on car number plates as they are easily readable and ANPR cameras can see them fine no excuses as many of the cases where speeding or traffic or any of the ANPR cameras can read the number plate fine

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569318
